column4: I am following this post http://www.webupd8.org/2010/10/install-gnome-shell-from-git-in-ubuntu.html to install the latest version of gnome 3 and I got the "possible error #2 "
and when git clone git://git.gnome.org/libnotify  I get fatal: destination path 'libnotify' already exists and is not an empty directory.
how can I fix that and move on ??
